resources.string: Free the lowest lord, let me up!

Free the lowest lord, let me up!
Antea Free Chat is a tool for message encryption on online communication, available for SMS, WeChat, QQ, and so on.
Instruction: First, please ensure Antea\'s accessibility service is on. Type the trigger characters (default for "....") will trigger encryption. Click on message will trigger decryption. The default password is 123, and password and trigger characters can be customized in settings.
Security and privacy: This app uses AES encryption standard. It is open source, it will not connect the Internet, and will not ask for any privilege.
Author: BaiJiFeiLong(https://baijifeilong.github.io). Email:baijifeilong@gmail.comã€‚
Decryption failed, wrong password or text: %s
Decrypted text has been copied to clipboard, double tap to revert in 10 seconds:\n%s
Default is 123, please use a stronger password
Default is ...., input this in edit text will trigger encryption
Enable debug mode to figure out some stupid bugs
